name: Cube Royale (itch)
description:
An Intense Game of Tag:

Play against other players or your friends in Cube Royale. The objective of the game is to stay away from the red cube and be the last one alive to win! As the red cube you must tag another player to stop your timer from hitting 0. 

Earn In Game Rewards:

By winning games you will earn in game rewards and level up your profile! Rewards in include awesome cube skins and player cards to show off!

Use Powerups:

While exploring the map find powerups that will give you an advantage over other players and the red cube!

Active Development:

I am constantly updating this game and adding new content and bug fixes! It has always been a dream of mine to release a simple multiplayer game and now I've finally done it! This is my passion and I want to build a community around this game!
